record.field:
Add a shadow to a product.
===Parameters=== * shadow_color The color of the shadow (string). rgba([red, 0 - 255], [green, 0 - 255], [blue, 0 - 255], [opacity, 0.0 - 1.0]) * shadow_x Shadow x-position, pixels (integer). * shadow_y Shadow y-position, pixels (integer). * gauss_radius Shadow bluriness radius, pixels (integer). * gauss_sigma Shadow bluriness standard deviation, pixels (integer). * background Path to background image.
See http://www.imagemagick.org/script/color.php for a detailed description of valid color strings.

shadow = Image() shadow.blank(width=image.width, height=image.height, background=Color(shadow_color)) shadow.format = 'png' shadow.alpha_channel = True x = int(shadow_x) y = int(shadow_y) #Transfer alpha to shadow image to create item shadow. shadow.composite_channel('alpha', image, 'darken', x, y) #Shadow created dark bars along edges. Create 'punch image' to make them transparent again. punch = Image() punch.blank(width=image.width, height=abs(y), background=Color('rgba(0, 0, 0 ,0)')) punch.format = 'png' punch.alpha_channel = True #Transfer alpha from punch to shadow. shadow.composite_channel('alpha', punch, 'darken', 0, 0 if y > 0 else image.height + y) punch.blank(width=abs(x), height=image.height, background=Color('rgba(0, 0, 0 ,0)')) shadow.composite_channel('alpha', punch, 'darken', 0 if x > 0 else image.width + x, 0) #Add bluriness to shadow shadow.gaussian_blur(int(gauss_radius), int(gauss_sigma)) #Add item on top of shadow shadow.composite(image, 0, 0) if background: bg = Image() bg.read(filename=background) res = Image() res.blank(width=image.width, height=image.height, background=Color('rgba(0, 0, 0 ,0)')) res.composite(bg, (image.width - bg.width) / 2, (image.height - bg.height) / 2) res.composite(shadow, 0, 0) else: res = shadow
